entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
